descriptionHtml:
[b]

Crysalia[/b]

A lop eared elf follower.

Follower Info
Name: Crysalia
Voice: FemaleEager
Body: UNP
Favorite Armor: Light Armor/Heavy Armor
Favorite Weapons: 2H Weapon / Bows / Magic
Location: The Frozen Hearth , Winterhold
Marriable: Yes
Essential: Yes

[b]Forwarning some headpieces like the mage's hood clashes with her ears.[/b]
